testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "Mahmoud" and last name "Salah"...................passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "test@example.com" field...............................passed And user fills company field................................................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "mbadreldin01@gmail.com" and "Msh2812@"................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "examble1234567879@yahoo.com" and "Msh2812@"...........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.name: Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "mbadreldin01@gmail.com" and "Msh2812@"................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed And user Navigate to Home and Select “Euro” from currency dropdown list.....passed Then Find all Elements with Euro currency...................................passed

testcase.classname: F06_homeSliders | user should be directed to Page needed from slider
testcase.name: first slider is clickable on home page

failure.message: The following asserts failed: Directed to wrong url it is supposed be: https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020 but directed to: https://demo.nopcommerce.com/ expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020]

testcase.failure:
Given user select Nokia Lumia slider........................................passed Then Nokia Lumia page will be opened........................................failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: The following asserts failed: Directed to wrong url it is supposed be: https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020 but directed to: https://demo.nopcommerce.com/ expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:46) at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:30) at org.example.stepDefs.D06_homeSlidersStepDef.userShouldBeDirectedToNokiaLumiaPage(D06_homeSlidersStepDef.java:29) at ✽.Nokia Lumia page will be opened(file:///E:/java-project-master/ECommeraceAppAutomationTesting/src/main/resources/features/F06_homeSliders.feature:5)

testcase.failure:
